name: Gallery Worker
description:
Gallery Worker is game made for WeeklyGameJam39
Theme was Take a Picture

Controlls:

WASD to move

LMB to take a picture

R to reset 

E to view gallery 

Ctrl to crouch

Enter to Accept

Tere are 2 types of ghost, one reacts to cropped photo, one reacts to finessy photo.

Finessy - ur camera rotation in X axis is above or below some value 

cropped - u made cropped photo xd 

Center oriented - ghost or exhibit at center 

left oriented - same but for left 

right oriented - same but for right 

Detection was made from 25 Rays from screen, so something might not work very well :D
